name: Saber Merge: Galaxy Battle
description: On the epic race, you need to run, slice and collect pieces of armor to build a perfect, awesome, and powerful armor oufit. The more armor you get, the more superpower you get. You will become the best superman in the Universe. You can run and slice everything as Beat and blader. At the end of the run race, you need to think quick and act fast, combine them all before your merge monster wins the battle
